author: BobbaBeep UwU
comment: This feels like a Kakegurui x Angels of death crossover where Yumeko is playing the game, but when the floor owners try tricking her or killing her thinking she's vulnerable and innocent it turns out she kills them instead floor by floor the owners hear about her and get frightened every time she passes onto the next floor. The priest tries to prove her guilty but instead she exposes him, and judges him instead, letting him burn in the fired he created. Yumeko then took his place and became god. The fun then ended for her, she wanted to feel the adrenaline, the agony of maybe dying while playing, she wanted to gamble with her life. So now that she was god she restarted the game going back in time and creating an endless loop of her playing the game, killing everyone, becoming god, and doing the same thing starting all over again.

comment: Day 1 of intensely describing the ad in the comments I got before the video:  A middle-aged man sits in a leaned back seat. He has a coarse handlebar mustache and a stiff receding hairline. There is the background buzzing of a tattoo pen. His face turns into a grimace as he leaned back in the chair, and jerks forward suddenly, sneezing. The bald man tattooing him stops and stares in horror at the mans arm. The arm holds a very pretty woman, with a visible apron and large smile. Under the woman, there is a ribbon with the word “Mom” written on it. A new, and rather ugly, black blob is right above her smiling mouth, much resembling the mustache of her son. The tattoo artist and man look at each other only for the man to look back in horror at the tattoo.  And scene. Thank you.

I want to watch it but i ended forgetting it  months later a kakegurui live action pmv came in my rec and i was somewhat familiar with the uniform and i vaguely remembered this video, thank god i manage to find this again.  so i decided to read the comments, and imagine my huge surprise when i found out this was an anime about gambling instead.  This AMV is a masterpiece 👏being able to change the entire theme of an anime and make others genuinely believe it is amazing! and the fact that its all in rhythm makes it even more amazing. Great video and youre certainly a talented editor

author: xAnicsi
comment: Whoa, how have I missed this video of yours?? I just cannot believe how much of a phenomenal editor you've become, Jasmine. Like, you were always one of my biggest inspirations and I loved each and every piece you edited, but I am just so amazed that you have come such a long way in terms of techniques and yet still seem to really enjoy editing the way like you did before! Trying to perfect my editing I've since lost the motivation and spark that I used to have, so I am so happy to see you're still going down that road and gifting us with such masterpieces. Thank you, and please be sure to edit for a very long time, even if just for fun. I hope you never feel pressured because it can truly end up ruining it. Fantastic work!

author: MagicDarkLight
comment: Yoooo!! My favourite from the contest, imo this video really has all a great AMV could hope for. The FX work is awesome and serves the editing which in itself is really intense and mastered, scene selection is incredibly on point with the atmosphere and yeah this really turned out cinematic. I looove the colors in this, it's the most beautiful red I've seen in an AMV and I love the intensity too, the synch at 41s is one of the most impactful I've seen in an horror video. There are a lot of small details and very creative stuff you did and I probably won't notice them all, but stuff like 1m24 with the red hands and text in the eye, the shadows at 0:26 and I'm just guessing you did the mouth incrust at 2m05, but those are the kind of things/FX that make a video truly stand out imo. Anyways I am just really enjoying this AMV xD If I had to nitpick a part, I'd say the 1:34 start of the scene selection for the chorus looked a bit more anime/generic than the rest.  Awesome work, thanks for sending it to Japan Expo, the reaction was reaaally good, lots of clapping and you were actually 2nd in Public's Choice too! Congratz o/
